title: Green Beans With Ginger and Garlic Recipe
ings: Salt,pounds green beans (French-style slim haricots verts work especially well), trimmed,tablespoons vegetable oil,cup minced fresh ginger (about 6 inches ginger root, peeled),medium-size garlic cloves, minced

title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Honey and Miso Recipe
ings: tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil,tablespoons honey,tablespoon red miso paste,teaspoon kosher salt,pound brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved lengthwise,lime, halved,cup chopped roasted almonds

title: Fluffy Mashed Potatoes Recipe
ings: pounds russet potatoes,cup whole milk, plus more as needed,cup cold salted butter, cut into pats,Salt,Freshly ground white or black pepper,cup heavy cream, plus more as needed (optional)
